-- | LDAP Authentication for Yesod.
--   
--   LDAP Authentication for Yesod.
@package yesod-auth-ldap
@version 0.0.3

module Yesod.Auth.LDAP
genericAuthLDAP :: YesodAuth m => LDAPConfig -> AuthPlugin m
data LDAPConfig
LDAPConfig :: (Text -> Text) -> (Text -> String) -> (Text -> [LDAPEntry] -> Text) -> String -> LDAPInt -> String -> String -> Maybe String -> LDAPScope -> LDAPConfig

-- | When a user gives username x, f(x) will be passed to LDAP
usernameModifier :: LDAPConfig -> Text -> Text

-- | During the second bind, the username must be converted to a valid DN
nameToDN :: LDAPConfig -> Text -> String

-- | When a user gives username x, f(x) will be passed to Yesod
identifierModifier :: LDAPConfig -> Text -> [LDAPEntry] -> Text
ldapHost :: LDAPConfig -> String
ldapPort' :: LDAPConfig -> LDAPInt
initDN :: LDAPConfig -> String
initPass :: LDAPConfig -> String
baseDN :: LDAPConfig -> Maybe String
ldapScope :: LDAPConfig -> LDAPScope
